attributes.background: We, the undersigned, find the criminalisation of not paying for a service which we do not choose to use to be reprehensible. The BBC, while providing a world-class service, does not provide programming that is to our individual tastes and as such we do not wish to pay for it. This is not criminal.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104367 

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
